{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.23901v1", "title": "Existence of periodic solution of a non-autonomous allelopathic
  phytoplankton model with fear effect", "summary": "In this paper, we consider a non-autonomous allelopathic phytoplankton
competition ODE model, incorporating the influence of fear effects observed in
natural biological phenomena. Based on Mawhin's coincidence degree theory some
sufficient conditions for existence of periodic solutions are obtained. We
validate our findings through an illustrative example and numerical
simulations, showing that constant coefficients lead to steady-state dynamics,
while periodic variations induce oscillatory behavior.", "main_category": "math.DS", "categories": "math.DS", "published": "2025-03-31T09:50:32Z"}
